acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 114 byteObjectField = 30 shortField = 80 shortObjectField = 38 charField = 8 charObjectField = E intField = 26051929 intObjectField = -1189260548 longField = 333521081727963 longObjectField = 333521081610907 floatField = 0.23162496 floatObjectField = 0.65597343 doubleField = 0.49430683157991184 doubleObjectField = 0.30544161602415754 stringField = I2nDw60GCg objectField = java.lang.Object@12e37ab2 calendarField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:05 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:05 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@51038633 intArray = [I@46c09751 booleanArray = [Z@76da91cf bigDecimalField = 138732458004 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{GCs5y9wiSO=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1434916985547 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@2c03678 elements
